get_states_of_all_home_assistant_devices.success_prompt: Here is the status of all your Home Assistant devices.
get_states_of_all_home_assistant_devices.fail_prompt: I'm sorry, I couldn't retrieve the status of your Home Assistant devices at this time.

function_name_examples.content:
User's request:
"Can you check the status of my smart home devices?"
Return "NOT_APPLICABLE" if there is no function that can help or the functions are unrelated to the query. Otherwise, pass the name of the function to call.
Fantastic, here is the next one.

Return "NOT_APPLICABLE" if there is no function that can help or the functions are unrelated to the query. Otherwise, pass the name of the function to call.
